EmailTemplate.name: BR Pre Update Email Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to charge $300 an hour? Visit MBO’s new and improved bill rate calculator and guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
I noticed that you have visited our bill rate calculator <http://www.mbopartners.com/#billrate> and I wanted to share the news that we have made some updates to it in case you wanted to take a fresh look. Perhaps it’s time to re-assess your hourly rate, or set a new one?
In case you don’t already have it, here’s the link to download our free 20-page Bill Rate Resource Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf>. I hope that the material is helpful to you in determining an appropriate consulting bill rate to charge clients.
Additionally, this spring we launched our popular, free monthly Independent Consulting Brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Sign-up today!
Regards, {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 f: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=sarhancet@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com
